text: niscayanga miru, mi dhana pranalato pariksimpabadataru; mariyu niscayanga, miku purvam grantham prasadincabadina vari nundi mariyu allah ku bhagasvamulu (sati) kalpincina vari nundi, miru aneka vedana kaligince matalu vintuntaru. Kani, okavela miru orpu vahinci, daivabhiti kaligi unte! Niscayanga adi ento sahasanto kudina karyam
